column6: SON OF ANARCHY! An oppressive domain run by BARON ZEMO! The peoples' only hope? An underground group of rebels... GORILLA-MAN! M-11! NAMORA! VENUS! MARVEL BOY! But their leader JIMMY WOO...captured! Can AGENT COULSON help save the resistance or will he lead them to their doom?
column8: | penciller (cover):Leonard Kirk | artist:Steve Pugh | writer:Tom Taylor
